attributes.action: Negotiate with any country in the Far East willing to accept our prison overspill.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Relocate the most violent of offenders and the ever increasing number of foreign nationals who are adding to our already overflowing prisons. It would be much cheaper to build and maintain prisons in any of these countries and the money saved could be used to support the NHS and other more deserving services.
